name: Journey of MEDI-DOE
description:
This games is about a journey through life until death which explores many medical technological advancements, this is based of artwork called "Map of Technological Ethics" by Qui Zhiji.

I was attempting to communicate two messages within my game that we develop these technology to be able to beat or control death with grants us comfort in life and when we die ultimately do we repeat the past again (in other words my life flashes through my eye ).

Voice your thoughts/opinion of the game in the section below.
